alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:53AM CDT until June 13 at 7:30AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TARRANT AND WESTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 653 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bedford, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington, Irving, Grand Prairie, Carrollton, Euless, Bedford, Grapevine, Cedar Hill, Haltom City, Coppell, Duncanville, Hurst, Farmers Branch, Southlake, Watauga, Colleyville, Addison and Richland Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows.
